Control Name: Define and implement policies and procedures to ensure proper user identification management for non-consumer users and administrators on all system components as follows:\nControl addition, deletion, and modification of user IDs, credentials, and other identifier objects.

control_attributes.Control: Define and implement policies and procedures to ensure proper user identification management for non-consumer users and administrators on all system components as follows:\nControl addition, deletion, and modification of user IDs, credentials, and other identifier objects.
control_attributes.Requirement: 8.1.2.Identify and authenticate access to system components
